scenario_text.value: Hey, check it out! I got a text too!

Let’s see, the part I can read is asking if
I’m okay, and taking my medicine.

Well, it’s clear someone’s concerned about
you, but it’s hard to make out the details.

But wait, I don’t remember hearing your phone
go off.
That’s because I put it on silent.

Wait, that’s a good idea. Everyone, silence
your phones so the alerts don’t surprise us.

Sorry to scare you, everyone. I’ve just set
mine to silent too.
Thanks! Guess we’re ready to go, then.
Let’s head straight for the Master!

Takuma, did you silence your phone? Once
you’re ready, it’s time to face the Master!
